weight initialization.from sentence: Our work explores the idea of adapting the weight initialization to the optimization dynamics of the specific learning task at hand .

improved weight initialization.from sentence: From the Bayesian perspective , improved weight initialization can be viewed as starting with a better prior , which leads to a more accurate posterior and thus better generalization ability .

adaptive prior.implemented via: Markov Chain Monte Carlo ( MCMC ) methods
adaptive prior.from sentence: For example , in the seminal works , an adaptive prior is implemented via Markov Chain Monte Carlo ( MCMC ) methods .

adaptive initialization.from sentence: Motivated by these ideas , we incorporate an " adaptive initialization " for neural network training ( see section 2 for details ) , where we use cyclical batch size schedules to control the noise ( or temperature ) of SGD .

different cyclical annealing strategies.from sentence: Here , we build upon this work by studying different cyclical annealing strategies for a wide range of problems .
